items.title: Project Gutenberg
items.description: Public-domain literature and multilingual texts — ideal for language learning.

items.title: LibreTexts
items.description: Open-access textbooks across languages, STEM, humanities, and social sciences.

items.title: Wikibooks: Filipino
items.description: Editable grammar and language guides for Filipino and English learners.

items.title: OpenStax Math
items.description: Peer-reviewed textbooks for PreCalculus, Calculus, Statistics, and more.

items.title: Open Textbook Library – Math
items.description: Freely licensed textbooks covering algebra, geometry, and other topics.

items.title: Wikibooks: Mathematics
items.description: Community-driven math texts from basic to advanced levels.

items.title: OpenStax Science
items.description: Free textbooks for Biology, Chemistry, Physics, and Environmental Science.

items.title: Open Textbook – Science
items.description: Diverse, accessible science textbooks across disciplines.

items.title: Wikibooks: Science
items.description: Collaborative science texts covering biology, physics, and technology.

items.title: PSSC Social Science Info
items.description: Open-access articles on Philippine social science and history topics.

items.title: Philippine History Source Book
items.description: Annotated primary sources for Philippine history education.

items.title: Wikibooks: Social Science
items.description: Text-based guides on sociology, anthropology, and related fields.

items.title: Wikibooks: Music
items.description: Free textbooks on music theory, history, and notation.

items.title: Public Domain Music Collection
items.description: Vintage sheet music and music theory essays in the public domain.

items.title: Wikimedia: Music Theory
items.description: Open-access articles on music theory fundamentals.

items.title: CK-12 FlexBooks®
items.description: Customizable textbooks with videos, diagrams, and embedded learning tools.

items.title: CK-12 Concept Pages & Videos
items.description: Concise concept explanations and walkthrough videos in math & science.

items.title: CK-12 HS Textbooks
items.description: Grade-level FlexBooks® with structured lessons and supporting resources.

items.title: Duolingo
items.description: Free courses for English, Tagalog, Spanish, and more.

items.title: TypingClub
items.description: Typing lessons and drills to build keyboard literacy.

items.title: Epic! (Free Tier)
items.description: Access digital books and videos for young readers.

items.title: Khan Academy
items.description: Extensive math lessons with practice exercises and tutorials.

items.title: Desmos Graphing Calculator
items.description: Visualize and interact with mathematical equations online.

items.title: GeoGebra Visual Toolkit
items.description: Dynamic tools for geometry, algebra, calculus, and statistics.

items.title: Wolfram|Alpha (Free)
items.description: Computational engine providing answers and visual math solutions.

items.title: Wolfram Arithmetic Manipulatives
items.description: Interactive fraction and number-line tools designed for elementary learners.

items.title: CK-12 Simulations (PLIX)
items.description: Interactive science and math simulations: manipulate variables and explore models.

items.title: CK-12 Braingenie Practice
items.description: Adaptive math & science problem engine with instant feedback.

items.title: CK-12 FlexBooks® as Tool
items.description: Use embedded quizzes and manipulatives inside FlexBooks® interactively.

items.title: BioNetwork Virtual Microscope
items.description: Browser-based microscope simulator with lens switching and specimen viewing.

items.title: MyScope Explore (SEM)
items.description: Free scanning-electron microscope simulation with zoom controls.

items.title: CASK Virtual Viewer
items.description: Zoomable digital slides and anatomy images for browser viewing.

items.title: OER Commons
items.description: Lesson plans and interactive resources created by educators in multiple subjects.

items.title: Academic Earth
items.description: Free video lectures covering topics from humanities, science, and more.

items.title: HelpTeaching Worksheets
items.description: Printable worksheets for math, writing, science, social studies, and music.
